plot outline: Sachin and Sushma meet at a hill resort. Sachin falls in love immediately but he is hesitated to tell his love to Sushma. Later he founds out that Sushma is engaged and her marriage is fixed with Kishore. But Sushma asks Sachin to act as her fiancee in front of her parents who are going to divorce after her marriage. The story takes a turn, when Advocate Gopinathan comes for the help of Sachin and Sushma.
title: Kaiyethum Doorath
plot: Sachin and Sushma meet at a hill resort. Sachin falls in love immediately but he is hesitated to tell his love to Sushma.
